public class EcoFlag extends Object implements Flag

    • getMoney

      @NotNull public @NotNull Map<org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.Currency,​BigDecimal> getMoney()
      Gets all balances found within the zone.
      Returns:
      A map of all balances within the zone separated by currency

    • getMoney

      @NotNull public @NotNull BigDecimal getMoney​(@NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.Currency currency)
      Gets the balance found within the zone
      Parameters:
      currency - The currency to get
      Returns:
      Gets the balance from the zone, if the zone does not contain that currency, a balance of 0 will be used unless there is no eco plugin found, in that case it will be Double.MAX_VALUE

    • hasBalance

      public boolean hasBalance​(@NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.Currency currency, @NotNull @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
      Checks if the flag has the specified balance
      Parameters:
      currency - The currency to check
      amount - The amount to check
      Returns:
      If the zone has that much, returns true if no eco plugin was found

    • setBalance

      public void setBalance​(@NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.Currency currency, @NotNull @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
      Sets the balance of a specific currency. This will override the current value. Will not take affect if no currency plugin was found
      Parameters:
      currency - The currency to use
      amount - The amount to set

    • withdraw

      @NotNull public @NotNull WithdrawTransaction withdraw​(@NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.Currency currency, @NotNull @NotNull BigDecimal amount)
      Removes the specified amount into the zone. If the zone does not have enough or no economy plugin is found then the transaction will fail
      Parameters:
      currency - The currency to use
      amount - The amount to withdraw
      Returns:
      The transaction
